attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motorcycles do less damage to the road than cars, they are more environmentally friendly and, in the main, have lower engine sizes than cars. Motorcycles take up less room to park and should be promoted.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap Motorcyle Road Tax."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15328.asp

Prime Minister's Office
